description:
METICULOUS 3 BEDROOM + 3 LIVING AREA FAMILY HOME!
This meticulously presented family home is sure to impress the most fastidious buyer. Situated on a half-acre of established & manicured gardens with a fully fenced rear yard the property is just minutes from Cockatoo Township & public transport. The home features 3 spacious bedrooms on the upper level, all with built in robes & the Master with a spacious ensuite, whilst the main bathroom is fully renovated & offers 2 vanities & a seamless shower. Downstairs there is a large rumpus room, ideal for the kids & their noisy toys, whilst upstairs is the comfortable formal dining room & lounge with ambient wood heater, and the home has mains GDH for the ultimate in comfort & convenience. Also upstairs is the well-appointed contemporary kitchen that is the entertainer's dream with 900mm stove, stainless steel appliances, Ceaser Stone benches & plenty of storage space. The kitchen opens onto the 3rd living room with split system, which then opens out to a sensational undercover alfresco area which takes in the peaceful elevated views & is perfect for entertaining all year round. Offering features such as soaring vaulted ceilings & Sydney Blue Gum floors this magnificent home leaves nothing to do but move in, relax & enjoy!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

RENOVATE, SUBDIVIDE OR DEVELOP (STCA)!
This is a unique opportunity to purchase over half an acre with access from both Carawa St & Naughton Rd Cockatoo, making it the ideal location for the dream home with a huge back yard, subdivision & potential for development (STCA) or renovate the existing home, knowing you have the space for the largest shed you can design & still have room for the kids to play. Located just a few hundred meters from Cockatoo, public transport, the Primary School, shops & eateries, this 2 bedroom cottage features a galley kitchen, family bathroom & good sized lounge. Outside there is a single carport & shed & over half an acre of very useable land with dual access & all services available. First home buyers & investors better be quick as this little beauty is ready for sale all you need bring is the vision!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

PRICED TO SELL
Imagine your new life on this lovely piece of land of approximately 1/4 of an acre, relatively flat, on the higher side of the road and ready to build (STCA).
This private and peaceful block is in a great location, close to the Cockatoo shopping strip, school, kindergarten and parks, within a short drive to Emerald or Pakenham.
Don't miss this opportunity to start building your dream.
Verica Crcic : 0402 012 499

THE SIZE WILL SURPRISE
This cedar home has been treated to a comprehensive makeover that has not only given it a new lease on life but also injected some style, colour and personality to really set it apart. With its fully fenced corner block giving some added privacy, the home sits in an elevated position with a covered ranch style verandah wrapping around the entire home. Inside the freshly painted tones give it an instant lift and highlight features including the generous lounge room with fresh carpet and the adjoining dining area with polished Baltic timber floors and a vibrant chandelier that can only make you smile. The kitchen is generously sized and features stunning hardwood bench tops, an Ilve 900mm stainless steel upright oven/stove and a concealed drawer style dishwasher.
There are 4 bedrooms, 3 with built in wardrobes - each with its own feature colours and you'll also enjoy a bathroom updated with dual vanities and be comforted by ducted heating during the icy months. Outside there's a dual entry driveway and a generous rear garden with a paved patio for entertaining and plenty of room for kids to play safely with a single car garage/shed.
Photo ID Required
Verica Crcic : 0402 012 499

OVER 1 ACRE CORNER BLOCK CLOSE TO COCKATOO!
4066 sqm block
All services available
Under 1km walk to Cockatoo
Sunlit corner block
Gorgeous dam on the property
Perfect spot to build the dream (STCA)!
*Please be aware there are dogs on property - Please call the agent to arrange inspection.

Spread Out On 1 Acre (approx).
Located at the end of a no-through road, this private block of 3955 m2 offers the opportunity for you to build a home to your dreams (STCA). Surround yourself with the sights and sounds of nature instead of those noisy neighbours in a great location that you are sure to love. Power, telephone, water and gas are all available, so call today inspection is a must!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

RENOVATED FAMILY HOME!
Situated an easy 15 minute stroll to Cockatoo, the Kindergarten, the Primary School, local shops & eateries & even closer to public transport this neat 4 bedroom family home leaves nothing to do but move in & enjoy. The home features 4 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, the Master with a renovated ensuite & direct access to a private, undercover courtyard with 6 person outdoor spa, offering the perfect place to retreat & relax after a busy day. The well-appointed kitchen features a 5 burner gas stove, electric oven, dishwasher & convenient island bench & opens onto the 2nd living area with air conditioner & access to a 2nd, fully fenced outdoor entertaining area. There is also a spacious formal lounge & dining room with new carpets & an air conditioner for added comfort whilst the home has mains GDH throughout. The whole home welcomes an abundance of natural light & a peaceful treed outlook from every window. Outside the property is fully fenced, ideal for the kids & four legged family & there is a double lock up shed with workshop & a new verandah around the front of the home offering elevated views over Cockatoo. Add the convenience of all mains services & this tidy & comfortable family home ticks all the boxes!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY.

'ELEGANCE, PRIVACY & SPACE ON 2.1 ACRES'
Start living the life you have been dreaming about with your family & furry friends on this delightful property nestled on 2.1 acres. Located only minutes from Cockatoo's township, transport & sporting facilities you are certain to love the location & the privacy it provides. Enjoy waking to the sounds of wildlife, kick the footy with the kids, potter around the bush gardens or enjoy alfresco dining with friends on the large decking area which is positioned to take in the wonderful vista that surrounds. Boasting open plan living with sunken lounge with a crackling open fire, ducted heating & gas heater, 3 x split systems, slate flooring, timber kitchen & large picture windows which frame the bush outlook. The home has been thoughtfully designed to ensure that the family can enjoy total comfort, with extra large bedrooms and ample storage space. Complete with an enormous triple garage (one roller door access), high ceilings and verandah all round the house - what on earth are you waiting for, an inspection is a must!
Call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522.
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

INSPECTION IS ESSENTIAL. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!
Situated on a private three quarters of an acre at the end of a cul de sac & only minutes to Cockatoo this meticulously styled & maintained 4 bedroom home is sure to impress the most fastidious of buyers. The home features 3 spacious bedrooms, all with peaceful garden views & the Master with walk in robe & modern ensuite. To add to the luxury, the main bathroom features a spa bath with a relaxing outlook over the ferns. The comfy formal lounge is the ideal place to relax away from the activity in the spacious, open plan kitchen, dining, family room which is the hub of the home. The well-appointed kitchen features gas cooking, double drawer dishwasher & plenty of bench & storage space, whilst the adjacent living room can accommodate the whole family watching the big game. The family room also opens directly onto a large undercover entertaining area with a sensational heated swim spa (negotiable) & serene views over the manicured rear garden & the adjacent bush land. For added comfort & convenience the home has mains GDH throughout & a split system for the warmer days. Outside there is a double lock up garage, a further 5 car garage with workshop & studio & attractive, established gardens, all fully fenced making it ideal for the kids & your furry family. This beautiful home ticks all the boxes & needs to be seen to be truly appreciated!
DON'T MISS OUT. CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

COMFORTABLE FAMILY LIVING!
This comfortable & solid, 4 bedroom family home is situated on a third of an acre minutes from Cockatoo, the local sporting grounds, public transport, the shops & the primary school. Featuring 4 bedrooms, 3 with built in robes & the master with a walk through robe & ensuite, the home is big enough for the whole family. The country, timber kitchen with dishwasher & plenty of cupboard space opens onto the family living room, whilst there is a large formal lounge, where everyone can congregate around the built in wood heater on those Winters nights. Add to this a separate dining area, mains GDH, mains water & a split system for added comfort & convenience. Outside the property is fully fenced, has a double lock up garage & tank water with a pump for the garden. A diamond in the rough, this property is just waiting for the right family to make it a home.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

NEAT 3 BEDROOM FAMILY HOME ON OVER ACRE!
This neat, low maintenance, western red cedar home is located on over one quarter of an acre within minutes of cockatoo, public transport, the local kinder & primary school & a variety of shops & eateries. The home features 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes, the Master with ensuite effect access to the spacious main bathroom. On the lower level there is a huge lounge room with raked ceiling & toasty wood heater for added ambience on those cool winters nights, whilst the home has mains GDH & a split system for added comfort & convenience. The well-appointed, light filled kitchen offers gas cooking & a handy breakfast bar & opens onto a spacious dining/living area with sparkling polished floor boards. Outside there is 2 X 5,000lt water tanks with a pump for the garden as well as mains water, a double lock up garage with concrete floor & power & plenty of room for the kids & furry friends to play in the fully fenced yard.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

CONTEMPORARY HILLS HOME FOR THE BUDDING ARTIST!
This unique hills home is perfectly set up for the extended family or budding artist, featuring 3 bedrooms & 2 living areas in the main residence & 2 separate studios with an abundance of windows, natural light, power & privacy. Located amongst established gardens on just over half an acre this character home offers 3 spacious bedrooms, 1 with an ensuite & 1 with a retreat area, ambient open fire & direct access to the upstairs balcony with views over the tree tops. The modern kitchen with dishwasher & island bench is located adjacent to the entry/living area & the sunlit dining room with access to the spacious undercover outdoor area. Downstairs there is a huge lounge with toasty open fire & gas heating for added convenience, as well as access to a balcony where you can relax & enjoy the serenity. The home also features a renovated bathroom, gorgeous exposed timber ceilings & a split system for added comfort. At the rear of the home the 2 studios are located in a separate building, each with their own entrance & power. If you are looking for a comfortable, unique, character filled home less than 1 km from Cockatoo, public transport & all its conveniences, look no further!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Contact Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

MUDBRICK HAVEN IN A GARDEN PARADISE!
This 4 bedroom, character filled mud brick home is situated on over a quarter of an acre minutes from Cockatoo, public transport, the primary school & a variety of shops & eateries. This immaculate home oozes charm from the moment you enter into the comfortable lounge with toasty wood heater to keep you warm on those wintery nights. Adjacent to the lounge is the dining area & well-appointed country timber kitchen with dishwasher & plenty of storage & bench space. The Master Bedroom is also downstairs & has a walk in robe & ensuite effect to the bathroom, whilst upstairs there are 3 spacious bedrooms, a second bathroom & a living area, all with outlooks over the gardens. Outside there is a huge paved undercover outdoor entertaining area that overlooks the salt water, solar heated pool, the perfect place to entertain through the warmer months. There is also a pool house or teenage accommodation which features a large room, walk in robe & generous ensuite. Add to this a 2 car barn with workshop, a sealed drive, all mains services & an established garden complete with meandering paths. If character, charm & presentation are what you seek, this is the one for you!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Outstanding Hills Home On Over 1/2 An Acre
Sale by Set Date 3/12/2013
Set in the quiet hills town of Cockatoo is this lovely brick home that offers a wonderful country life for the whole family. Boasting 3 large bedrooms all with built in robes, gorgeous bathroom with spa bath, modern kitchen with dishwasher, dining room and large adjoining lounge room. Special features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2.2kw solar capacity, roller shutters, sealed drive and under home storage. Outside there is a large decked entertaining area surrounded by beautiful established gardens & lush lawns, access to a creek that runs along the back of the property, 4 car garage with remote entry and workshop & a fully fenced yard of over 1/2 an acre. All of this within easy reach of the hills town of Cockatoo and Emerald. Call today to inspect this delightful home!!!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

CLASSY COCKATOO
This property is as pleasant as Cockatoo is peaceful.
Naturally you'll be pleased with the four bedrooms, two separate living areas, massive garage/shed and manual climate control but it's the extras that emulate the homely feel.
Our vendors love to cook so it comes as no surprise the kitchen is the pride and joy of the house. 900mm stainless steel appliances and loads of bench space make for a functional kitchen while the hand-made boutique cupboards add a quaint touch.
Just last month the house spectacularly transformed. New tiling, fresh paint and a front yard makeover gives the house a vibrant look. The recent renovations have expanded the dwelling to 18 squares with a new master bedroom that includes walk-in robe and en suite.
The flat 1533sqm (approx) block features a patio, a veggie patch and fruit orchard that caters for potato, lemon, asparagus and other various types of fruit while leaving room to kick the footy.

Light Bright & Spacious With A Huge Garage!
Sale by Set Date 3/12/2013
Completely renovated throughout, this modern home is sure to please the whole family. The open plan living and dining area is overlooked from the stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. The home boasts 3 bedrooms, master that features a large stylish ensuite and WIR along with a second living area to ensure that everyone has their own space. Special features include, gas ducted heating, split system, polished floors, fresh paint work, new appliances and fittings throughout. Outside there is plenty to love with large lawn areas, manicured gardens and hedges, kids play area, vegie garden, massive 9X12 garage, sealed driveways and pathways with feature edging. All this on a flat 1/4 acre (APPROX) completely fenced corner block with dual access.
Inspection is a must, this one won't last!
Photo ID Required
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Total Perfection On 1/2 An Acre (approx.)
This gorgeous ranch style home is perfectly positioned on a completely usable and fully fenced 1/2 acre allotment (approx.).
The home offers open plan living with a large lounge adjoining dining room that is overlooked by the kitchen that features stainless steel appliances. Large windows allow plenty of natural light to flow through and views of the yard and beautiful established gardens that surround.
The home also features 3 bedrooms, master bedroom comes complete with a huge walk in robe and ensuite, gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, coonara and vaulted ceilings. Outside you will find yourself entertaining all summer long with large deck areas, BBQ pergola area, single carport, double garage/workshop with concrete floor & power, above ground pool, veggie garden and much more. This home has everything to please the whole family so call today inspection is a must!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

NEAT & COMFORTABLE FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT!
Situated on almost a quarter of an acre, literally 700m form the centre of Cockatoo, public transport, the Primary School, various takeaways & the local restaurant this neat 3 bedroom home represents exceptional value. The home is located at the front of the block with a carport to the side & access to the rear yard, leaving plenty of room to build the shed & the playground for the family. The home features 3 spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes & the Master Bedroom offers an ensuite effect to the main bathroom. The kitchen has plenty of cupboard & bench space & is located adjacent to the generous meals area & the comfortable lounge. Add to this the convenience of a new mains gas ducted heating system, mains water & a low maintenance garden. The ideal first home or investment opportunity!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Your Country Dream On Over 6.75 Acres
Sale by Set Date 26/11/2013
Boasting immaculate presentation both inside & out this stunning home showcases a blend of country style living with modern conveniences. Designed with family comfort in mind, the home offers 2 large living areas, 3 bedrooms master that offers a walk-in robe and semi ensuite, plus there are lovely views from every window of the peace & privacy that surrounds.
The stunning country style kitchen boasts quality fittings including an integrated dishwasher and stainless steel appliances.
Special features include a large covered decked entertaining area, triple garage with remote doors, a double carport, large storage room, natural gas ducted heating, split system and 3 water tanks. Set on over 6.75 acres which is divided into 8 paddocks with water troughs, electric fencing, shelter boxes, stables, tack room, hot and cold wash bay and with an Olympic sized arena the property is fully set up to accommodate any horse enthusiast! Other assets the property offers is a large dam, fire sprinkler facility, dog run, chicken coop, irrigated established gardens, vegie patch & plenty of lush green lawns for the kids to enjoy.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

On Top of the World on 2.5 Acres (Approx.)
Blissfully private and peaceful
this passive solar designed north facing mud brick home offers soaring high ceilings, open living spaces and large windows combining together to create a tranquil atmosphere throughout. Featuring all the modern conveniences yet oozes character throughout with exposed recycled timbers. The home boasts 4 bedrooms and a study. Downstairs offers 2 large rooms and study, the beautiful timber kitchen with Raeburn combustion stove is positioned perfectly and overlooks the spacious open living area with central coonara. The feature spiral staircase leads upstairs to the master bedroom with full ensuite and WIR, 4th bedroom and an open living area or parents retreat. There is plenty of storage throughout the home and every window overlooks rolling hills valleys and established gardens, large lawn areas, orchard, chicken coop, 55,000L tank water, solar hot water and 4 fully fenced paddocks. Sit back and enjoy the scenery inside and out.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Brick Family Home On A Flat 1/4 Acre
Located in one of Cockatoos most highly sought after streets is this lovely low maintenance brick home that offer plenty of space for you to enjoy your hills lifestyle. Sitting perfectly on a flat 1/4 acre in a quiet street in Cockatoo the home features a large open plan lounge & dining area, gas ducted heating, 3 large bedrooms all with BIR's, master including ensuite & WIR, timber panelling, exposed beams and much more. Outside you will discover a covered decked entertaining area, front verandah, large open lawn areas and plenty of off street parking. Call today this one won't last!!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781
